transArray.content: Breakfast is delayed until 12:00, very close to the airport and the subway station. South Station is far away. Suitable for traveling and living. The chains across the country are like this. The public area is large, the rooms are generally not large, the hot water is abundant, and the sound insulation is average. They choose to stay according to the daily schedule of young people in Beijing, and they are not suitable for the elderly. Not suitable for tour groups. Because getting up too early will affect other passengers to rest
